# minimumSize

**Instance Property**

The minimum width and height supported by your app’s windows.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var minimumSize: CGSize { get set }
```

## Setting the size restrictions

- **maximumSize**: The maximum width and height supported by your app’s windows.
- **allowsFullScreen**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the scene can appear full screen.
